alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:14AM PST until March 01 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches above 5500 feet with at least 3 inches above 4000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snowfall is expected through this morning. The snow level will rise to 4500 feet early this morning, then fall below 3000 feet by afternoon.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
